word[0]: something is not an exact science
definition[0]: if you say that an activity is not an exact science, you mean that it involves opinions, guessing etc
example[0]: Predicting the weather is not an exact science.
definition[1]: used to say that something involves a lot of guessing and there is not just one right way to do it
example[1]: Advertising is not an exact science – you’re always taking a risk.
